title: (x) "Metropolitan World Atlas" cover sans - Akkurat {Pieter}
content:
the form is like Helvetica, however, it has the lowercase “l” and “t” with touch like FF DIN, Info and Officina...

can anyone give a hand? thanks.

comments.content:
It looks like Akkurat by Lineto.  
 [http://www.lineto.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012040650/http:/www.lineto.com/ "http://www.lineto.com")

Pieter
